definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: lay a bait or lure (v. [[מוֹקֵשׁ]]), then gen. lay snares (v. also [[נקשׁ]], [[קוֹשׁ]])—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. [[יׇק֫שְׁתִּי]] Je 50:24; [[יׇֽקְשׁוּ]] Ps 141:9; Pt. pl. [[יוֹקְשִׁים]] Ps 124:7; —lay snares, fig. of devices of wicked Ps 141:9 (c. acc. cogn.); of ´[[י]]'s plan to destroy Babylon Je 50:24 [[יקשׁתי לך וגם נלכדר]]; Pt. as subst. bait-layers, fowlers Ps 124:7 (cf. Ps 141:9) sim.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[נוֹקַ֫שְׁתָּ]] Pr 6:2; [[וְנוֹקְשׁוּ]] consec. Is 8:15, Is 28:13; Impf. 2 ms. [[תִּוׇּקֵשׁ]] De 7:25; be caught by a bait, ensnared, in business entanglements Pr 6:2; in disastrous consequences of idolatry De 7:25 (‖[[נלכד]]); of those ensnared by ´[[י]]'s plans (sq. [[ונלכדו]]) Is 8:15 Is 28:13.

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pt. [[יוּקָשִׁים]] (for [[מְיוּקָשִׁים]], unless this should be read: Ges:§ 52. R. 6; Sta:§ 220): entrapped, in circumstances of life Ec 9:12.
